802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{see also|ASUS RT-N12 series|ASUS RT-N11P|ASUS RT-N12+|ASUS RT-N300}} * Multiple 3-in-1 Router/Access Point/Range Extender wireless modes * Two external 5dBi antennas for more powerful and wider coverage * 4 SSIDs help manage bandwidth allocation and access control ==Links of Interest== ===Forum threads=== * [https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=63139 ''Support Asus RT-N12E B1'' on '''OpenWrt''' forums] (images PCB) * [http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:60674-4#90 RTN's post on '''iXBT''' forums] * [http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:62022-10#303 Padavan's post on '''iXBT''' forums] ===Reviews=== *[http://www.ixbt.com/comm/asus-rt-n11p.shtml ''ASUS RT-N11P'' on '''iXBT'''] (tested [https://code.google.com/p/rt-n56u/ FW] by '''Padavan''') *[http://foxnetwork.ru/index.php/en/component/content/article/184-asus-rt-n11p.html ''ASUS RT-N11P'' on '''FoxNetwork''']
